languages.text: {n}Женщина бледно улыбается.{/n} "Молодой господин Винтерскейл — не тень своего отца. Если он решил спасти друга — не отступится. Молю {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g}, чтобы он был цел! Он ушел уже давно, и... мне очень не нравится это место".

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина бледно улыбается.{/n} "Молодой господин Винтерскейл — не тень своего отца. Если он решил спасти друга — не отступится. Молю {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g}, чтобы он был цел! Он ушел уже давно, и... мне очень не нравится это место".

languages.text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

{n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

languages.text: {n}Sonríe levemente.{/n} «El joven lord Winterscale no es la sombra de su padre. Si se ha propuesto salvar a su amigo, hará todo lo que haga falta. Rezo al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} porque esté sano y salvo. Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde que se marchó, y... sinceramente, no me gusta este lugar».
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sonríe levemente.{/n} «El joven lord Winterscale no es la sombra de su padre. Si se ha propuesto salvar a su amigo, hará todo lo que haga falta. Rezo al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} porque esté sano y salvo. Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde que se marchó, y... sinceramente, no me gusta este lugar».

languages.text: {n}Sie lächelt schwach.{/n} "Der junge Lord Winterzunder ist nicht seines Vaters Schatten. Wenn er entschlossen ist, seinen Freund zu retten, wird er nicht nachgeben. Ich bete zum {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g}, dass er wohlauf ist. Er ist schon so lange fort, und ... Mir gefällt es hier nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie lächelt schwach.{/n} "Der junge Lord Winterzunder ist nicht seines Vaters Schatten. Wenn er entschlossen ist, seinen Freund zu retten, wird er nicht nachgeben. Ich bete zum {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g}, dass er wohlauf ist. Er ist schon so lange fort, und ... Mir gefällt es hier nicht."

languages.text: {n}Elle sourit légèrement.{/n} « Le jeune seigneur Winterscale ne marche pas dans les pas de son père. S'il a décidé de sauver son ami, il ne reculera pas. Je prie le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} qu'il soit toujours en vie. Il est parti depuis si longtemps, et... je n'aime pas du tout cet endroit. »
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle sourit légèrement.{/n} « Le jeune seigneur Winterscale ne marche pas dans les pas de son père. S'il a décidé de sauver son ami, il ne reculera pas. Je prie le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g} qu'il soit toujours en vie. Il est parti depuis si longtemps, et... je n'aime pas du tout cet endroit. »

languages.text: {n}她微微一笑。{/n}“您说得没错，年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵和他父亲不太一样。如果他打算要拯救他的朋友，他就会排除万难，实现他的目标。我向{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}祈祷，希望他安然无恙。他已经去了这么久，而且……我真的不太喜欢这里。”
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}她微微一笑。{/n}“您说得没错，年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵和他父亲不太一样。如果他打算要拯救他的朋友，他就会排除万难，实现他的目标。我向{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}祈祷，希望他安然无恙。他已经去了这么久，而且……我真的不太喜欢这里。”

languages.text: {n}彼女は微かに微笑んだ。{/n}「若きウィンタースケール様は、お父上の陰に隠れてなどいません。友人を救うと決心されたなら、引き下がることはないでしょう。あの方が生きてご無事であることを{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}にお祈りいたします。あの方の行方は本当に長い間わかっておりませんし、それに…やはり私はこの場所をまったく好きにはなれません」
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は微かに微笑んだ。{/n}「若きウィンタースケール様は、父上の陰に隠れてなどいません。友人を救うと決心したなら、引き下がらないでしょう。あの方が生きてご無事であることを{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に祈ります。ずっと戻って来ないのです、それに…やっぱりこの場所は好きじゃないですね」
{n}彼女は微かに微笑んだ。{/n}「若きウィンタースケール様は、お父上の陰に隠れてなどいません。友人を救うと決心されたなら、引き下がることはないでしょう。あの方が生きてご無事であることを{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}にお祈りいたします。あの方の行方は本当に長い間わかっておりませんし、それに…やはり私はこの場所をまったく好きにはなれません」

languages.text: {n}Kadın belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Genç Lord Winterscale, babasına pek benzemez. Dostunu kurtarmayı kafasına koyduysa caymayacaktır. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht'tan{/g} tek duam, hayatta olması. Gideli çok uzun zaman oldu ve... Buradan hiç hoşlanmadım."
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles faintly.{/n} "Young Lord Winterscale is not his father's shadow. If he is determined to save his friend, he won't back down. I pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} that he is alive and well. He's been gone for such a long time, and... I really don't like this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Genç Lord Winterscale, babasına pek benzemez. Dostunu kurtarmayı kafasına koyduysa caymayacaktır. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g}'tan tek duam, hayatta olması. Gideli çok uzun zaman oldu ve... Buradan hiç hoşlanmadım."
